entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

annotations.normalized_text: The Fourth Crusade and the Sack of Constantinople

text:
@joncoopertweets Now reading “The Fourth Crusade and the Sack of Constantinople”.

What US president does Emperor Alexis III bring to mind here? (Hint: replace “crusaders” with”coronavirus”.) https://t.co/SVc2Cuk088
